q1.question: Do I need a WhatsApp Business API?
q1.answer: Yes, VARYLO connects to Meta's Cloud API. We guide you through the setup process.

q2.question: Can I change my plan later?
q2.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or cancel your plan at any time from the administration panel.

q3.question: Does AI read all my messages?
q3.answer: AI only analyzes messages when the functionality is active for quality reports, respecting privacy.
